channel.title: Serious Form Problem

item.title: Serious Form Problem
item.dc:creator: @skys_shadow skys shadow
item.description:
@skys_shadow wrote:

What you did is in the variables up top you had help being a TEdit but it was really a TLabel. I fixed that and 5 or so other errors that you had in your script. See if this helps–

[code]
{~}
{~power~skills~script~by~shock}
{~SSSSSSS~H~H~OOOOOOCCCCCC~KK~}
{S~SH~HOOCCK~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
{SH~HOOC~KK~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
{~SSSSSSS~HHHHHHHHHOOC~K~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
{SH~HOOC~K~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
{SH~HOOCCK~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
{~SSSSSSS~H~H~OOOOOOCCCCCC~K~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
{~}
{~}
{~~~~~~~~~~~ SETUP }
{~ 1. set-up players and constants }
{~ 2. make shure that you have an axe/ }
{~ pic axe EQUIPED }
{~ 3. click play! }
{~ }
{~ }
{~ credits }
{~ to all of the creators of SRL! i could not }
{~ have made my script without SRL! }
{~ me - for coding it }
{~ }
{~ fetures: }
{~ power mining }
{~ power choping }
{~ anti-ban/anti-randoms }
{~ }
{~ fetures in the next version: }
{~ axe head finding }
{~ more anti-randoms }
{~ banking(if i get the time) }
{~}
{~}
{~}
{~}
{~}
{~~~~~~~~~~~}
program hybrid;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

var
loads : integer;
frmDesign : TForm;
Minning : TLabel;
xtra : TForm;
Cutting : TLabel;
Start : TButton;
Edit1 : TEdit;
Edit2 : TEdit;
Extra : TButton;
Responder : TLabel;
help : TLabel;
Yea : TEdit;
Yes : TEdit;
Done : TButton;
const

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~CONSTANTS~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

objcolor= {~} 4624512 {~a color on the object} ;
loadstodo= {~} 99999 {the amount of loads~} ;
waittime= {~} 5000 {~wait time between clicks~} ;
{~}
{~}
{~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

procedure ButtonClick(Sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
begin
xtra.Caption:= xtra.Caption + ‘.’;
xtra.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;
end;

procedure Hybridyform;
begin
xtra := CreateForm;
xtra.Left := 250;
xtra.Top := 114;
xtra.Width := 696;
xtra.Height := 480;
xtra.Caption := ‘Extra Settings’;
xtra.Color := clBtnFace;
xtra.Font.Color := clWindowText;
xtra.Font.Height := -16;
xtra.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
xtra.Font.Style := [];
xtra.Visible := True;
xtra.PixelsPerInch := 96;
help := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
help.Parent := frmDesign;
help.Left := 113;
help.Top := 129;
help.Width := 55;
help.Height := 20;
help.Caption := ‘Antiban?’;
Responder := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Responder.Parent := frmDesign;
Responder.Left := 112;
Responder.Top := 166;
Responder.Width := 79;
Responder.Height := 20;
Responder.Caption := ‘Responder?’;
Yea := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Yea.Parent := frmDesign;
Yea.Left := 208;
Yea.Top := 130;
Yea.Width := 121;
Yea.Height := 24;
Yea.TabOrder := 8;
Yea.Text := ‘Yea’;
Yes := TEdit.Create(xtra);
Yes.Parent := frmDesign;
Yes.Left := 208;
Yes.Top := 168;
Yes.Width := 121;
Yes.Height := 23;
Yes.TabOrder := 9;
Yes.Text := ‘Yes’;
Done := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Done.Parent := frmDesign;
Done.Left := 218;
Done.Top := 211;
Done.Width := 75;
Done.Height := 25;
Done.Caption := ‘Done’;
Done.TabOrder := 10;
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 350;
frmDesign.Height := 350;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Shocks Hybrid Cutter + Minning’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Minning := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Minning.Parent := frmDesign;
Minning.Left := 120;
Minning.Top := 165;
Minning.Width := 55;
Minning.Height := 20;
Minning.Caption := ‘Minning’;
Minning.Font.Color := clWindowText;
Minning.Font.Height := -16;
Minning.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
Minning.Font.Style := [];
Minning.ParentFont := False;
Cutting := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Cutting.Parent := frmDesign;
Cutting.Left := 121;
Cutting.Top := 192;
Cutting.Width := 51;
Cutting.Height := 20;
Cutting.Caption := ‘Cutting’;
Cutting.Font.Color := clWindowText;
Cutting.Font.Height := -16;
Cutting.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
Cutting.Font.Style := [];
Cutting.ParentFont := False;
Start := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Start.Parent := frmDesign;
Start.Left := 206;
Start.Top := 245;
Start.Width := 75;
Start.Height := 25;
Start.Caption := ‘Start’;
Start.TabOrder := 8;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 186;
Edit1.Top := 195;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 9;
Edit1.Text := ‘Yes’;
Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit2.Left := 185;
Edit2.Top := 167;
Edit2.Width := 121;
Edit2.Height := 21;
Edit2.TabOrder := 10;
Edit2.Text := ‘No’;
Extra := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Extra.Parent := frmDesign;
Extra.Left := 151;
Extra.Top := 246;
Extra.Width := 44;
Extra.Height := 23;
Extra.Caption := ‘Extra’;
Extra.TabOrder := 11;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
{}
{~DO NOT TOUCH UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING}
{}
HowManyPlayers := {} 1 {~how many players?~} ;
NumberOfPlayers {} (HowManyPlayers){~NEVER TOUCH~~~} ;
CurrentPlayer:= {} 0 {~current player} ;
{}
{}
{~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~PLAYER SET-UP~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

Players[0].Name := {} ‘username’ {~username~} ;
Players[0].Pass := {} ‘password’ {~password~} ;
Players[0].Nick := {} ‘nick’ {~nick~~~~~} ;
Players[0].Active:= {} True {~is this player active?~} ;
{}
{}
{~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
End;

{DO NOT TOUCH BELOW UNLESs YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING}

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~script setup~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

procedure setup;
begin
SetupSRL;
DeclarePlayers;
LoginPlayer;
end;

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~anti randoms~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

procedure AntiRnd;
begin
begin
if(Yes.Text= ‘Yes’) then
FindTalk;
FindNormalRandoms;
if (FindFight = true) then
begin
RunAwayDirection(‘E’);
Wait(10000 + random(2000));
RunBack;
end;
end;
end;

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~reply to talker procedure~for~antiban~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

procedure ReplyToMsg;
begin
if(Yea.Text= ‘Yes’) then
if (InChat(‘mining lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘mining levels?’))or
(InChat(‘att lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘attack levels?’))or
(InChat(‘def lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘defence lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘def levels?’))or
(InChat(‘defence levels?’))or
(InChat(‘str levels?’))or
(InChat(‘strength levels?’))or
(InChat(‘str lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘strength lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘wc lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘woodcutting lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘wc levels?’))or
(InChat(‘woodcutting levels?’))or

                       (InChat('mining lvls?'))or

(InChat(‘mining levels?’))or
(InChat(‘att lvls’))or
(InChat(‘attack levels’))or
(InChat(‘def lvls’))or
(InChat(‘defence lvls’))or
(InChat(‘def levels’))or
(InChat(‘defence levels’))or
(InChat(‘str levels’))or
(InChat(‘strength levels’))or
(InChat(‘str lvls’))or
(InChat(‘strength lvls’))or
(InChat(‘wc lvls’))or
(InChat(‘woodcutting lvls’))or
(InChat(‘wc levels’))or
(InChat(‘woodcutting levels’))or
(InChat(‘att levels’))then
begin
Wait(500 + Random(500));
TypeSend(‘none of ur buesness lol’);
end;
end;

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Progress Report~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

procedure ProgReport;
begin
Writeln(’[{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}]’);
Writeln(‘Worked For : ’ + ScriptTime2(2))
Writeln(‘chopped/mined ‘+ IntToStr(loads) + ’ loads’);
Writeln(’[{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}]’);
end;
{}
{logs loop~}
{}
procedure lumberjackloop;
begin
repeat
if not LoggedIn then Exit;
ReplyToMsg;
wait(waittime +random(200));
FindObj(x, y,‘op d’ , objcolor, 10);
Mouse(x, y , 4 , 4, true);
AntiRnd;
until (InvFull);
loads:=loads+1
wait(waittime +random(200));
AntiRnd;
end;
{}
{ores loop~}
{~~~~~~~~~~~~}
procedure minerloop;
begin
repeat
if not LoggedIn then Exit;
ReplyToMsg;
wait(waittime +random(200));
FindObj(x, y,‘Mine’ , objcolor, 10);
Mouse(x, y , 4 , 4, true);
AntiRnd;
until (InvFull);
loads:=loads+1
wait(waittime +random(200));
AntiRnd;
end;

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~main loop~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
loads:=0
ActivateClient;
setup;
DisguiseSCAR(‘Mortgages - Wikipedia the free encyclopedia - Microsoft Internet Explorer’);
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[0].Nick, UpChars);
repeat
HighestAngle;
Makecompass(‘N’);
if (Edit2.Text= ‘Yes’) then
begin
lumberjackloop;
end
if(Edit1.Text=‘Yes’) then
begin
minerloop;
end;
dropall;
progreport;
until(loadstodo = loads)
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Form Problem
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

help.Parent := frmDesign;

That says that the label will be on the frmDesign form, but freDesign isnt mentioned until later in the script, thus, i dont think it knows what/where the form is. Just make a form in the form editor, load it, and copy and paste is and try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Form Problem
item.dc:creator: @reece844 reece844
item.description:
@reece844 wrote:

Well i have tried and tried to fix but nothing worked.

[code]{~}
{~power~skills~script~by~shock}
{~SSSSSSS~H~H~OOOOOOCCCCCC~KK~}
{S~SH~HOOCCK~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
{SH~HOOC~KK~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
{~SSSSSSS~HHHHHHHHHOOC~K~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
{SH~HOOC~K~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
{SH~HOOCCK~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
{~SSSSSSS~H~H~OOOOOOCCCCCC~K~K~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
{~}
{~}
{~~~~~~~~~~~ SETUP }
{~ 1. set-up players and constants }
{~ 2. make shure that you have an axe/ }
{~ pic axe EQUIPED }
{~ 3. click play! }
{~ }
{~ }
{~ credits }
{~ to all of the creators of SRL! i could not }
{~ have made my script without SRL! }
{~ me - for coding it }
{~ }
{~ fetures: }
{~ power mining }
{~ power choping }
{~ anti-ban/anti-randoms }
{~ }
{~ fetures in the next version: }
{~ axe head finding }
{~ more anti-randoms }
{~ banking(if i get the time) }
{~}
{~}
{~}
{~}
{~}
{~~~~~~~~~~~}
program hybrid;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

var
loads : integer;
frmDesign : TForm;
Minning : TLabel;
xtra : TForm;
Cutting : TLabel;
Start : TButton;
Edit1 : TEdit;
Edit2 : TEdit;
Extra : TButton;
Responder : TLabel;
help : TEdit;
Yea : TEdit;
Yes : TEdit;
Done : TButton;
const

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~CONSTANTS~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

objcolor= {~} 4624512 {~a color on the object} ;
loadstodo= {~} 99999 {the amount of loads~} ;
waittime= {~} 5000 {~wait time between clicks~} ;
{~}
{~}
{~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

procedure ButtonClick(Sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
begin
xtra.Caption:= xtra.Caption + ‘.’;
xtra.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;
end;

procedure Hybridyform;
begin
xtra := CreateForm;
xtra.Left := 250;
xtra.Top := 114;
xtra.Width := 696;
xtra.Height := 480;
xtra.Caption := ‘Extra Settings’;
xtra.Color := clBtnFace;
xtra.Font.Color := clWindowText;
xtra.Font.Height := -16;
xtra.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
xtra.Font.Style := [];
xtra.Visible := True;
xtra.PixelsPerInch := 96;
help := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
help.Parent := frmDesign;
help.Left := 113;
help.Top := 129;
help.Width := 55;
help.Height := 20;
help.Caption := ‘Antiban?’;
Responder := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Responder.Parent := frmDesign;
Responder.Left := 112;
Responder.Top := 166;
Responder.Width := 79;
Responder.Height := 20;
Responder.Caption := ‘Responder?’;
Yea := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Yea.Parent := frmDesign;
Yea.Left := 208;
Yea.Top := 130;
Yea.Width := 121;
Yea.Height := 24;
Yea.TabOrder := 8;
Yea.Text := ‘Yea’;
Yes := TEdit.Create(xtra);
Yes.Parent := frmDesign;
Yes.Left := 208;
Yes.Top := 168;
Yes.Width := 121;
Yes.Height := 23;
Yes.TabOrder := 9;
Yes.Text := ‘Yes’;
Done := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Done.Parent := frmDesign;
Done.Left := 218;
Done.Top := 211;
Done.Width := 75;
Done.Height := 25;
Done.Caption := ‘Done’;
Done.TabOrder := 10;
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 696;
frmDesign.Height := 480;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Shocks Hybrid Cutter + Minning’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := True;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Minning := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Minning.Parent := frmDesign;
Minning.Left := 120;
Minning.Top := 165;
Minning.Width := 55;
Minning.Height := 20;
Minning.Caption := ‘Minning’;
Minning.Font.Color := clWindowText;
Minning.Font.Height := -16;
Minning.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
Minning.Font.Style := [];
Minning.ParentFont := False;
Cutting := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Cutting.Parent := frmDesign;
Cutting.Left := 121;
Cutting.Top := 192;
Cutting.Width := 51;
Cutting.Height := 20;
Cutting.Caption := ‘Cutting’;
Cutting.Font.Color := clWindowText;
Cutting.Font.Height := -16;
Cutting.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
Cutting.Font.Style := [];
Cutting.ParentFont := False;
Start := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Start.Parent := frmDesign;
Start.Left := 206;
Start.Top := 245;
Start.Width := 75;
Start.Height := 25;
Start.Caption := ‘Start’;
Start.TabOrder := 8;
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 186;
Edit1.Top := 195;
Edit1.Width := 121;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 9;
Edit1.Text := ‘Yes’;
Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit2.Left := 185;
Edit2.Top := 167;
Edit2.Width := 121;
Edit2.Height := 21;
Edit2.TabOrder := 10;
Edit2.Text := ‘No’;
Extra := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Extra.Parent := frmDesign;
Extra.Left := 151;
Extra.Top := 246;
Extra.Width := 44;
Extra.Height := 23;
Extra.Caption := ‘Extra’;
Extra.TabOrder := 11;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
{}
{~DO NOT TOUCH UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING}
{}
HowManyPlayers := {} 1 {~how many players?~} ;
NumberOfPlayers {} (HowManyPlayers){~NEVER TOUCH~~~} ;
CurrentPlayer:= {} 0 {~current player} ;
{}
{}
{~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~PLAYER SET-UP~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

Players[0].Name := {} ‘username’ {~username~} ;
Players[0].Pass := {} ‘password’ {~password~} ;
Players[0].Nick := {} ‘nick’ {~nick~~~~~} ;
Players[0].Active:= {} True {~is this player active?~} ;
{}
{}
{~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
End;

{DO NOT TOUCH BELOW UNLESs YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING}

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~script setup~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

procedure setup;
begin
SetupSRL;
DeclarePlayers;
LoginPlayer;
end;

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~anti randoms~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

procedure AntiRnd;
begin
begin
if(Yes.Text= ‘Yes’) then
FindTalk;
FindNormalRandoms;
if (FindFight = true) then
begin
RunAwayDirection(‘E’);
Wait(10000 + random(2000));
RunBack;
end;
end;

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~reply to talker procedure~for~antiban~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

procedure ReplyToMsg;
begin
if(Yea.Text= ‘Yes’) then
if (InChat(‘mining lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘mining levels?’))or
(InChat(‘att lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘attack levels?’))or
(InChat(‘def lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘defence lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘def levels?’))or
(InChat(‘defence levels?’))or
(InChat(‘str levels?’))or
(InChat(‘strength levels?’))or
(InChat(‘str lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘strength lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘wc lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘woodcutting lvls?’))or
(InChat(‘wc levels?’))or
(InChat(‘woodcutting levels?’))or

                       (InChat('mining lvls?'))or

(InChat(‘mining levels?’))or
(InChat(‘att lvls’))or
(InChat(‘attack levels’))or
(InChat(‘def lvls’))or
(InChat(‘defence lvls’))or
(InChat(‘def levels’))or
(InChat(‘defence levels’))or
(InChat(‘str levels’))or
(InChat(‘strength levels’))or
(InChat(‘str lvls’))or
(InChat(‘strength lvls’))or
(InChat(‘wc lvls’))or
(InChat(‘woodcutting lvls’))or
(InChat(‘wc levels’))or
(InChat(‘woodcutting levels’))or
(InChat(‘att levels’))then
begin
Wait(500 + Random(500));
TypeSend(‘none of ur buesness lol’);
end;
end;

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Progress Report~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

procedure ProgReport;
begin
Writeln(’[{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}]’);
Writeln(‘Worked For : ’ + ScriptTime2(2))
Writeln(‘chopped/mined ‘+ IntToStr(loads) + ’ loads’);
Writeln(’[{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}][{}]’);
end;
{}
{logs loop~}
{}
procedure lumberjackloop;
begin
repeat
if not LoggedIn then Exit;
ReplyToMsg;
wait(waittime +random(200));
FindObj(x, y,‘op d’ , objcolor, 10);
Mouse(x, y , 4 , 4, true);
AntiRnd;
until (InvFull);
loads:=loads+1
wait(waittime +random(200));
AntiRnd;
end;
{}
{ores loop~}
{~~~~~~~~~~~~}
procedure minerloop;
begin
repeat
if not LoggedIn then Exit;
ReplyToMsg;
wait(waittime +random(200));
FindObj(x, y,‘Mine’ , objcolor, 10);
Mouse(x, y , 4 , 4, true);
AntiRnd;
until (InvFull);
loads:=loads+1
wait(waittime +random(200));
AntiRnd;
end;

                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~main loop~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}
                   {~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~}

begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
loads:=0
ActivateClient;
setup;
DisguiseSCAR(‘Mortgages - Wikipedia the free encyclopedia - Microsoft Internet Explorer’);
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[0].Nick, UpChars);
repeat
HighestAngle;
Makecompass(‘N’);
if(Edit2.Text= ‘Yes’) then
begin
lumberjackloop;
end;
if(Edit1.Text;=‘Yes’) then
begin
minerloop;
end;
dropall;
progreport;
until(loadstodo = loads)
end.[/code]
